description: Configuration file for Dedicated Tasks extension

abbreviation.description: Custom abbreviation for this workspace folder. If set, this will be used instead of the auto-generated abbreviation. Displayed in status bar and tree view for multi-folder workspaces.

statusBar.description: Status bar configuration for this folder

itemNames.description: List of task or launch configuration names to show in the status bar

groups.description: List of group paths. All items in these groups will be shown in the status bar.
